author: potuz
content: If it's next week what would be the day?

author: terencechain
content: I'd prefer wed.  Thursday is ACD. Friday is epbs right?

author: matthewkeil
content:
Yes. Wednesdays are mostly open bi-weekly starting next week.  There will be some overlap with Roll Call for L2EVM (Feb 12, Mar 12, Apr 9, Aug 13).  If we have this week and do biweekly cadence it will overlap with Roll Call on Jan 22, May 14, Jun 11, July 9.

If we move it to next Tuesday 14th, and use two week cadence it will not overlap any meetings.  How does that sound ??

author: soispoke
content: The poll seems to indicate wednesday

author: matthewkeil
content: I guess we can just keep with wednesday though.  Not sure how critical it is that we not overlap RollCall though.  Does anyone here join that meeting?

author: soispoke
content: I'm honestly fine with either tuesday or wednesday, my only preference is we wait until next week so that people that have been working on FOCIL can have some time to prepare and present their progress

author: matthewkeil
content:
Quick poll to make sure we are ok moving to Tuesday (biweekly cadence) instead of Wednesday.  Either would be 2pm UTC
